Articles.Content:
Hello Kerbonauts!

I was wondering if such a project already existed? A mod launcher/updater that mod maker could register their mod with, and it could download the mod (zipped or not) and install it. Mod maker could then push notifications for updates to allow for a one click update.

I was pondering starting such a project, but I just wanted to make sure something don't already existed, so that I contribute to it instead of spreading effort.
Look there, it may be interesting for your project.
